meta-model.fullname: CMCC Complete Sociology and Anthropology ToE Meta-Model
meta-model.name: Sociology & Anthropology ToE Meta-Model
meta-model.description: A unified meta-model capturing social structures, cultural norms, and interaction networks. This model encodes survey data, demographic records, and social network relationships, and enables predictive modeling of social behavior and network dynamics.

meta.title: CMCC Complete Sociology & Anthropology ToE Meta-Model
meta.subtitle: A Declarative Framework for Modeling Social Dynamics and Cultural Norms
meta.abstract: This meta-model represents social structures, cultural norms, and interaction networks in a syntax‐free, ACID‐compliant environment. By leveraging declarative primitives, it supports community health indexing, social cohesion metrics, and predictive modeling of network dynamics.

entities.name: Community
entities.description: Represents a social community or group with shared cultural or demographic characteristics.

fields.name: demographics
fields.description: Key demographic information about the community.

lookups.name: interactions
lookups.description: Social interactions recorded within the community.

aggregations.name: community_health_index
aggregations.description: Aggregate measure of the community's overall well-being.

aggregations.name: social_cohesion_metric
aggregations.description: Quantifies the degree of cohesion within the community.

aggregations.name: cross_community_interaction_score
aggregations.description: Evaluates the frequency and intensity of interactions between this community and other communities.

aggregations.name: cohesion_between_communities
aggregations.description: Measures synergy or collaborative engagement between this community and neighboring communities.

aggregations.name: community_leadership_index
aggregations.description: Assesses the presence and impact of recognized leaders within the community.

aggregations.name: generational_shift_index
aggregations.description: Tracks how the age distribution changes over time within the community.

calculated_fields.name: predictive_behavior_model
calculated_fields.description: Model predicting future social behavior trends based on current data.

entities.name: Individual
entities.description: Represents a person within a community.

fields.name: community_id
fields.description: Reference to the community the individual belongs to.

lookups.name: cultural_norms
lookups.description: Cultural norms that the individual adheres to.

aggregations.name: social_influence_score
aggregations.description: Quantitative measure of the individual's influence in the network.

aggregations.name: inter_community_mobility
aggregations.description: Quantifies how many times the individual has changed community affiliation.

aggregations.name: network_brokerage_score
aggregations.description: Measures the individual's role as a bridge or broker in the social network.

aggregations.name: individual_cultural_alignment_score
aggregations.description: Assesses the individual's level of alignment with prevailing cultural norms.

calculated_fields.name: network_dynamics
calculated_fields.description: Evaluates the dynamics of the individual's social network.

calculated_fields.name: life_stage_classification
calculated_fields.description: Categorizes the individual's life stage based on age (e.g. youth, adult, senior).

entities.name: Survey
entities.description: Represents a survey conducted within a community.

fields.name: community_id
fields.description: Reference to the community where the survey was conducted.

fields.name: survey_date
fields.description: Date when the survey was administered.

lookups.name: participants
lookups.description: Individuals who participated in the survey.

aggregations.name: average_response
aggregations.description: Average response score from the survey.

aggregations.name: trend_analysis
aggregations.description: Trend analysis based on survey responses.

aggregations.name: survey_response_over_time
aggregations.description: Tracks how response patterns evolve across successive survey administrations.

aggregations.name: survey_participant_diversity_index
aggregations.description: Measures the demographic diversity of survey participants.

calculated_fields.name: predictive_model
calculated_fields.description: Predicts future social trends based on survey data.

entities.name: CulturalNorm
entities.description: Represents a cultural norm or standard within a community.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the cultural norm.

fields.name: community_id
fields.description: Reference to the community to which the norm applies.

aggregations.name: norm_adherence_index
aggregations.description: Measures the degree to which community members adhere to the norm.

aggregations.name: norm_influence_spread
aggregations.description: Calculates the rate at which this norm is adopted across individuals and communities.

aggregations.name: cultural_norm_convergence
aggregations.description: Assesses how this norm overlaps or converges with other norms within or across communities.

aggregations.name: cross_norm_interaction_effects
aggregations.description: Evaluates synergistic or conflicting effects between this norm and other norms in the community.

entities.name: SocialInteraction
entities.description: Represents an interaction between two individuals.

fields.name: community_id
fields.description: Reference to the community where the interaction took place.

fields.name: interaction_type
fields.description: Type or category of the interaction.

aggregations.name: interaction_frequency
aggregations.description: Frequency count of this type of interaction.

aggregations.name: most_active_interaction_type
aggregations.description: Identifies the most commonly occurring interaction type within this social interaction set.

aggregations.name: interaction_time_series_trend
aggregations.description: Examines how interaction frequency and types change over chronological intervals.

calculated_fields.name: dynamic_strength
calculated_fields.description: Evaluates the strength of the relationship based on interaction type and frequency.

entities.name: Family
entities.description: Represents a family unit within or across communities, capturing immediate or extended kinship ties.

fields.name: family_name
fields.description: Name of the family or the primary surname associated with it.

fields.name: community_id
fields.description: Reference to the primary community this family is associated with.

fields.name: family_structure
fields.description: JSON describing the internal structure (e.g., nuclear, extended) and notable relationships.

lookups.name: members
lookups.description: All individuals belonging to this family.

aggregations.name: family_cohesion_metric
aggregations.description: Quantifies how cohesive and interdependent the family unit is.

aggregations.name: family_size_trend
aggregations.description: Analyzes how family membership size evolves over time.

aggregations.name: family_intergenerational_support_score
aggregations.description: Measures the level of support exchanged across multiple generations within the family.

aggregations.name: predictive_family_expansion
aggregations.description: Forecasts the likelihood of new members joining or existing members leaving the family unit.

calculated_fields.name: family_lifecycle_stage
calculated_fields.description: Identifies whether the family is in an early, expanding, or mature lifecycle stage based on membership and structure.

entities.name: Organization
entities.description: Represents a formal organization, institution, or collective operating within or across communities.

fields.name: organization_type
fields.description: Type of organization (e.g., nonprofit, business, government).

fields.name: description
fields.description: High-level overview of the organization’s purpose or function.

lookups.name: associated_communities
lookups.description: Communities in which this organization operates or has membership.

aggregations.name: organizational_influence
aggregations.description: Assesses how influential the organization is based on its size and reach.

aggregations.name: org_cross_community_overlap
aggregations.description: Indicates the extent to which the organization spans multiple communities.

aggregations.name: event_sponsorship_impact
aggregations.description: Evaluates the organization's influence or visibility gained through sponsoring social events.

aggregations.name: organization_collaboration_density
aggregations.description: Measures the depth and breadth of collaborations or partnerships with other organizations.

calculated_fields.name: organizational_growth_forecast
calculated_fields.description: Predicts the organization’s potential growth or decline in membership and impact.

entities.name: SocialEvent
entities.description: Represents a significant event (e.g., gathering, protest, celebration) that occurs within or across communities.

fields.name: event_name
fields.description: Name or title of the event.

fields.name: community_id
fields.description: Primary community where the event is based.

fields.name: location
fields.description: Location or venue where the event takes place.

fields.name: details
fields.description: Additional structured data describing the event (agenda, expected turnout, organizers, etc.).

lookups.name: attendees
lookups.description: Individuals who attend or participate in the event.

aggregations.name: event_participation_level
aggregations.description: Number of attendees or participants in the event.

aggregations.name: social_event_recurrence_prediction
aggregations.description: Estimates the probability that a similar event will occur in the future based on historical patterns.

aggregations.name: event_community_engagement_index
aggregations.description: Quantifies the level of engagement and participation from the community in this event.

calculated_fields.name: social_impact_assessment
calculated_fields.description: Evaluates the social implications of the event for the community (and potentially beyond).

CulturalNorm.description: High value placed on mutual aid and support.

Organization.description: A local volunteer-run organization dedicated to community services.
